name: 9GAG, Inc
description: Operator of an online platform and social media website designed to share user-generated content. The company's online platform and social media website provides comical images that features user-generated videos under categories such as fail and prank, comedy, game, TV and music, providing users with an engagement platform for fun, conversation and connection.
one_liner: Operator of an online platform and social media website designed to share user-generated content.
